Method Detail

countRecords

java.lang.Object countRecords(com.bmc.arsys.api.ARServerUser context, java.lang.String schema, java.lang.String query)
Returns:
returns the record size
Parameters:
context - The AR System Context to work with
schema - The schema to query
query - The query itself. If empty it will be set to '1'!=\$NULL\$

createEntries

java.lang.Object createEntries(com.bmc.arsys.api.ARServerUser context, java.lang.String schema, java.lang.Object entryObjects)
Returns:
returns a TreeMap with all entry ids and any errors
Parameters:
context - The AR Server Context to use
schema - The AR Form Name
entryObjects - The JSON Objects to create

deleteEntries

java.lang.Object deleteEntries(com.bmc.arsys.api.ARServerUser context, java.lang.String schema, java.lang.String query, int firstEntry, int maxEntries)
Returns:
returns all records as HashMap
Parameters:
context - The AR System Context to work with
schema - The schema to query
query - The query itself. If empty it will be set to '1'!=\$NULL\$
fisrtRow - The first record to return. Counting starts with 0
maxRows - The number of rows to return. 0 = all entries

getARContext

java.lang.Object getARContext(java.lang.String server, int port)

getFields

java.lang.Object getFields(com.bmc.arsys.api.ARServerUser context, java.lang.String schema)
Returns:
fieldDefinition of the schema
Parameters:
context - The ARServerUser context to connect to the AR System Server
schema - The schema name to get the field information

getForms

java.lang.Object getForms(com.bmc.arsys.api.ARServerUser context)
Returns:
a list of all forms on the server
Parameters:
context - The AR Server Context to use

getServerConfig

java.lang.Object getServerConfig(com.bmc.arsys.api.ARServerUser context)

java.lang.Object queryForm(com.bmc.arsys.api.ARServerUser context, java.lang.String schema, java.lang.String query, java.lang.Boolean returnFieldNames, java.lang.Boolean translateSelectionFields, int firstEntry, int maxEntries, java.lang.Boolean showDisplayOnlyFields)
Returns:
returns all records as HashMap
Parameters:
context - The AR System Context to work with
schema - The schema to query
query - The query itself. If empty it will be set to '1'!=\$NULL\$
fisrtRow - The first record to return. Counting starts with 0
maxRows - The number of rows to return. 0 = all entries

Returns:
returns a TreeMap with all entry ids and any errors
Parameters:
context - The AR Server Context to use
schema - The AR Form Name
entryObjects - The JSON Objects to update
